resources.title: Thinking Elixir 163 — Job Queues using Oban with Parker Selbert
resources.description: Interview with Oban’s creator covering design, extensions (Web/Pro), and real-world scale.

resources.title: Scaling Oban Applications — ElixirConf EU 2024
resources.description: Conference talk on scaling strategies, plugins, backoff, and operational considerations with Oban.

resources.title: Parallel Request Processing with Elixir and Oban
resources.description: DockYard tutorial using Oban jobs to parallelize HTTP requests with backoff and rate limiting.

resources.title: Oban Beyond the Basics — Joseph Yiasemides
resources.description: Meetup talk diving into advanced Oban patterns beyond initial setup.

resources.title: How to set up recurring jobs with Oban in Elixir
resources.description: Tutorial creating daily scheduled jobs (e.g., digest emails) with Oban and Bamboo.
